alert.note: Alert for Knox (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 10 at 5:47PM EST until January 11 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Barbourville affecting Knox County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Barbourville. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 PM EST Monday the stage was 23.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting, but will continue to run high through the overnight hours tonight. - Action stage is 21.5 feet. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 5 AM Tuesday.
